summary.success_message: All pinned dependencies are within policy and no critical vulnerabilities were detected.

actions.python_vuln: Update the pinned requirement to a version without critical CVEs and regenerate train/requirements.lock using pip-compile.
actions.python_stale: Upgrade the pinned requirement and refresh train/requirements.lock (pip-compile --generate-hashes).
actions.python_warn: Plan upgrades for warning-level pins and refresh train/requirements.lock during the next maintenance window.
actions.vcpkg_stale: Run `vcpkg x-update-baseline` (or bump the builtin-baseline commit) and rebuild.
